markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Draxie's Recipe Book](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2177)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 112 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This tiny recipe book was created by a famous [draxie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1323) chef, but it instantly resizes to fit the hand and eyes of the reader. While most of the pages are blank and ready to receive spells, the first four pages are taken up by a complex seasoning recipe that requires a casting of [_glitterdust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=136).

<document level="2" id="action-1674" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Draxie's Recipe Book
